name: Claymation Game Demo
description:
The bridge levels from Crash Bandicoot meets Silent Hill.

This is a project I've been working on over the past few months. It is an experiment in combining stop-motion clay sprites with PSX-style 3D graphics.

This is just a very short tech demo with no ending.

Controls

W, A, S, D / Left Analogue Stick - Move

Space / Xbox A - Jump

Shift / Xbox L1 - Run

ESC / Start - Pause
